Consistency key as Gisborne midweek netball resumeshttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/03/consistency-key-as-gisborne-midweek-netball-resumes/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/03/consistency-key-as-gisborne-midweek-netball-resumes/ Waikohu Prems v Gisborne Girls' High; Whāngārā Old Girls v Horouta. Tue, 02 Jul 2024 21:00:00 +0000 Defending champions Whāngārā Old Girls will be looking to recapture top form tonight when they take on Horouta Koura in the YMCA in Premier Grade netball at the YMCA. Waikohu Prems face Gisborne Girls' High Senior A High in the other game. Waikohu's Humaria Higgins (right) contests possession with Whāngārā's Summer Marama-Kingi in a round 1 game. Photo / Liam Clayton
